question: I had a dream recently about death while on hajj
answer:
QUESTION
I have recently had a dream in which I am preparing to go to Hajj in the following year, I am then told by someone that I am going die while on this trip to Hajj, I look at myself in the mirror and start to cry saying that I am too young to die as I am only 18. I was hoping you would be able to help me in understanding what this dream means.
ANSWER

Death is a reality and is%0D%0Aimminent. A believer should always be conscious of death, irrespective of%0D%0Abeing young or old and make necessary preparations for it.
